Title: Top anime - missing images.
Content: MAL has changed how those images are loaded in html, fix on monday. Sorry for inconvenience.

Title: v4.2.3.0 preview!
Content: Due to random storms randomly trying to fry my computer I did not manage to finish this update today as I planned. I have previews though, which are available on github. Help me test them out!

Title: New profile page!
Content: Profile page will get 3rd update soon, full revamp for dekstop and updates for mobile. It'll include more stats, basic user details, comments, friends and ability to view other users' accounts. Screenshots on github :)

Title: Manga update issues.
Content: I'm aware of those crashes, fix coming on Monday as MSFT won't certificate update during weekend. Sorry :(
